channel.title: able on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in able on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-15
item.description: Microsoft releases DirectStorage: ‘a new era of fast load times and detailed worlds in PC games’ (3 minute read) Microsoft’s DirectStorage API has arrived for Windows.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-09
item.description: The 7 biggest announcements from Apple’s Peek Performance event (3 minute read) Apple announced a new version of the iPhone SE, a new desktop Mac, an external monitor, and more at its Peek Performance event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-23
item.description: Google Voice now lets you decide who goes to voicemail (1 minute read) Google Voice can now be configured to forward calls to a linked phone number or voicemail.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-29
item.description: Apple still working on multi-device charger, a future where all devices ‘can charge each other’ (2 minute read) Apple is working on a multi-device charger for its products as well as short and long-distance wireless charging.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-11
item.description: Apple launches Apple Business Essentials: Device management, storage, onsite repairs, and more for one monthly price (2 minute read) Apple Business Essentials is a new offering from Apple that combines device management, 24/7 phone support for IT and end-users, business iCloud support, and an option for onsite repairs for some businesses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-11
item.description: Google Pixel 6 leak teases Magic Eraser feature, plus five years of Android security updates (2 minute read) Leaks from a marketing website seem to confirm that the Pixel 6 will have a new Magic Eraser feature and get five years of Android security updates.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-30
item.description: Facebook’s next hardware launch will be its Ray-Ban ‘smart glasses’ (2 minute read) Facebook’s next product release will be its Ray-Ban smart glasses.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-16
item.description: Square to Create a New Bitcoin Platform for Financial Services (1 minute read) Square is building an open developer platform to make it easier to provide non-custodial, decentralized financial services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-25
item.description: Microsoft is bringing Android apps to Windows 11 with Amazon’s Appstore (2 minute read) Windows 11 will be able to run Android apps natively.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-03
item.description: Ask Me Anything (TLDR AMA) Hey guys, I am doing an ongoing ask me anything as the first TLDR AMA.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-24
item.description: Microsoft in talks with Discord over $10 billion-plus acquisition (1 minute read) Microsoft is in discussions to acquire Discord for more than $10 billion.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-10
item.description: Shopify’s payment option to be added to Facebook, Instagram (1 minute read) Shopify is expanding its Shop Pay payment option to all users selling on Facebook and Instagram.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-05
item.description: Google Pixel phones will soon track heart rate using only the camera (3 minute read) Google’s latest Pixel-exclusive feature is the ability to track heart rate and respiratory rate using only the existing cameras.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-27
item.description: Amazon’s Alexa can now act on its own hunches to turn off lights and more (2 minute read) Alexa will now be able to proactively act on Hunches thanks to its latest update.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-21
item.description: Uber can now deliver prescriptions in Seattle and Dallas (1 minute read) Uber has partnered with NimbleRx and expanded its Uber Health Business to include medicine delivery in Seattle and Dallas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-31
item.description: Huawei tops Samsung as world’s No. 1 smartphone company for first time (2 minute read) Huawei has surpassed Samsung as the world’s number one supplier of smartphones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-27
item.description: Galaxy Watch 3 app reveals new gestures for calls, taking photos (2 minute read) The Samsung Galaxy Watch 3 app has arrived at the Play Store.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-15
item.description: Amazon’s new smart shopping cart lets you check out without a cashier (4 minute read) Amazon has a new smart grocery store cart that is equipped with a touchscreen and other hardware to automatically detect what items are being placed inside it.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-01
item.description: Nearby Sharing — Android’s AirDrop competitor — is rolling out now in beta (5 minute read) A beta test for Android’s Nearby Sharing feature is rolling out via the Play Services beta.
